questionTitle: <u><font color='red'>It</font></u> was Isadora Duncan <u><font color='red'>who</font></u> was responsible for many of the <u><font color='red'>new innovations</font></u> that have made modern dance <u><font color='red'>different from</font></u> classical ballet.
